posts.post_content:
Looking to part with this for $199 paypal regular. Grades low, mark back. Might trade for high grade '57s or hindu back, or low grade graded T206s with high eye appeal.

Nice olive BL phelps.  Haven't seen that since one for a few yrs. good luck on the sale Pat.
Heading to eBay in a day, would take $180 dlvd.
